original: 《 三國演義 》所虛構之人物，曹魏將領。蜀漢北伐時，司馬望率李鵬、王真二將抵禦蜀軍，李鵬為蜀將傅僉所殺。
text: The fictitious character in 'The Romance of the Three Kingdoms', General Cao Wei. During the Northern Expedition of the Shu Han Dynasty, Sima Wang led Li Peng and Wang Zhen to resist the Shu army, and Li Peng was killed by the Shu general Fu Yu.
